name: inverter_3ph_grid_loadstep_template
design_prompt: Design a grid-forming 3-phase inverter controller for weak-grid operation with load-step robustness, inrush limiting, and safe transient behavior.
control_design_notes: Prioritize grid-forming stability. If simple PI fails, use VSG or VOC. Add active inrush limiting and inner current-loop protection during load steps and grid connection.
